name: Sticky Jump (A Cup Of Coffee)
description:
Controls:

[A / Left Arrow] - Move Left

[D / Right Arrow] - Move Right

[W / Space / Up Arrow] - Jump

[LShift / RCtrl] - Dash

Additional Controls:

[R] - Restart Level

[T] - Start Over Again

Descriptions:

Sticky Jump is a game jam submission for Mini Jam 123 with the theme "Web" with a limitation "There is no ground" that made in 2 days 19 hours (5 hours before the deadline). this is my first game jam and I glad can made it on time, Its kinda fun actually...
